title: The Warrior - Orchestral Battle Music Pack (70+ Tracks & Loops)
description: My video game music pack “The Warrior” is my second pack to be released in 2024. You will get 11 original tracks, in 70+ variations (50+ loops) and over 90 minutes of music in total!
longDescription:
My video game music pack “The Warrior” is my second pack to be released in 2024. I wrote the pack for video games in mind but it can be used for any video project that can benefit from intense music. With 11 YouTube-Safe high quality orchestral music tracks you will get an extreme value for money. 



You will get 11 original tracks, in 70+ variations (50+ loops) and over 90 minutes of music in total! The music is written, produced, mixed and mastered by me and I’m not using AI in any way while making my music. My music is 100% made by me.


Listen to the pack here:

Teaser (Youtube)

All Tracks Playlist (Soundcloud)


1. PRO AAA-QUALITY MUSIC that instantly elevates the experience of your game.

2. ROYALTY-FREE MUSIC use the music without having to pay royalties.

3. FREE FUTURED UPDATES new added tracks will be free of charge.

4. FULL ORCHESTRA & CHOIR to get that Epic, Cinematic feeling while playing.

5. CUSTOMER SATISFACTION is my number one priority.


Sounds like

Dark Souls

Elder Scrolls

World of Warcraft

The Witcher

God of War


These songs are a mix of epic, intense, energetic, triumphant music, making it perfect for combat, battles, boss battles, high-energy cut scenes, and more.


My music is Youtube-Safe and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential when players showcase your game in videos or streams for YouTube, and other similar platforms.


You will not get a copyright claim and you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need Royalty-Free! Use the music over and over, in any of your projects or productions, without any additional fees.


Tracklist - 71 audio files (.wav 44.1 kHz, 16-bits)


[Main Tracks]

Arm Yourselves [1:09]

Cave Troll [1:22]

Drums In The Deep [1:36]

Gather The Army [2:00]

Into The Dark [1:24]

No Return [2:15]

Regroup [2:07]

The Battle Begins [2:24]

To The Death [2:41]

Unknown Enemy [2:30]

Warhorn [2:49]


Instructions

Since I don’t know how much intensity and sound effects that you will use in each particular scene I have made “Lite” and “Full” versions. The Lite versions have minimal melodies and are more background-music-like, the Full versions are with all the intended instruments. A bonus is that you can use this to extend the track and get more variations by using the "lite" version first, then transition into the "full" version and then back to the lite version.


The loops are arranged after length and can be used as they are, put in a row, or put together in a lot of different combinations using the software of your choice. There is free software that can be used for this as well.


Background

I’m an independent music composer that loves to write music for the orchestra. I want my music to sound high quality and epic, like “Hollywood”-music, huge, dramatic and well-produced at an affordable price.


I would appreciate some constructive criticism and suggestions. It is you as a game developer or video editor that (hopefully) will be my customer and I want my music to serve your project as well as possible. 


Customer satisfaction is my highest priority so if you have any questions don’t hesitate to reach out to me. I’m also very interested to hear about the game or project that you used my music in, and I would love to listen, play and share it on my social media if i may? In other words I’d like to be a part of your project.


Thank you so much for supporting my music!
